name: shoot-1bit
description:
this is a simple shooter game for the 1-bit clicker jam, and is also my first game being released publicly.

please use the comments if you want mac builds, linux, but no mobile. i don't mind ¯\_(:D)_/¯

CONTROLS:

lmb - move / rmb - shoot / move mouse - aiming

yep. that's it! simplicity is key you know ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

CHANGELOG: please visit the new location: [open in new tab]

this build maybe the last build of this game. i am very proud of my work on this, but there are more projects that were temporary shelved to try to make this game the best it could. i will definitely fix bugs, make any improvements i can to help this be the best it can. i am very supportive of the idea of "non-jam editions" of games to help extend them content wise. like i said, i am very proud of how this game turned out, and i love making games. but the games i make either don't release because of quality or just giving up. i was proud of how i focused free time into this project. the non-existent deadline and little focus was the contributing factor of the cancelled games that so very few have seen. the deadline and the restrictions helped me focus. thanks in advance :)
